mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(user_id, title, content) VALUES(#{userId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, u.username, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM reply r WHERE r.post_id = p.id AND r.status = 1) AS reply_count FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.id WHERE p.status = 1 ORDER BY p.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
